name: ORS Balances Report
description:
Balances Report displays offender balances in Current, Spends, Savings and Hold accounts in establishment specified at runtime.
FIN0082 - v00.00.03 Last Modified: 24/09/2020

dataset.name: Balances
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT * AS NOMS_NO_ FROM (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, 1, 1) || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME, 1, 1) || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2 IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2, 1, 1) END END, TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'dd/mm/yyyy'), SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID) + 2, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION)), SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_ACCOUNT_CODES.ACCOUNT_CODE) = 2101 THEN AT_OFFENDER_SUB_ACCOUNTS.BALANCE ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_ACCOUNT_CODES.ACCOUNT_CODE) = 2103 THEN AT_OFFENDER_SUB_ACCOUNTS.BALANCE ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_ACCOUNT_CODES.ACCOUNT_CODE) = 2102 THEN AT_OFFENDER_SUB_ACCOUNTS.BALANCE ELSE 0 END) FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SUB_ACCOUNTS AT_OFFENDER_SUB_ACCOUNTS, OMS_OWNER.ACCOUNT_CODES AT_ACCOUNT_CODES, OMS_OWNER.LIVING_UNITS AT_ALL_LIVING_UNITS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_SUB_ACCOUNTS.OFFENDER_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ROOT_OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_ACCOUNT_CODES.ACCOUNT_CODE = AT_OFFENDER_SUB_ACCOUNTS.TRUST_ACCOUNT_CODE) AND (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID (+) = AT_ALL_LIVING_UNITS.LIVING_UNIT_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID = WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.CASELOAD_ID) AND (WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND ((AT_ALL_LIVING_UNITS.AGY_LOC_ID || '-' || AT_ALL_LIVING_UNITS.LEVEL_1_CODE IN ('All') OR 'All' IN ('All')) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_OFFENDER_SUB_ACCOUNTS.CASELOAD_ID = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) AND AT_OFFENDER_SUB_ACCOUNTS.TRUST_ACCOUNT_CODE IN (2101, 2102, 2103)) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, 1, 1) || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME, 1, 1) || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2 IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2, 1, 1) END END, TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'dd/mm/yyyy'), SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID) + 2, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION))) _query0 FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, 1, 1) || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME, 1, 1) || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2 IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2, 1, 1) END END, TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'dd/mm/yyyy'), SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID) + 2, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION)), SUM(AT_OFFENDER_SUB_ACCOUNTS.HOLD_BALANCE) FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SUB_ACCOUNTS AT_OFFENDER_SUB_ACCOUNTS, OMS_OWNER.LIVING_UNITS AT_ALL_LIVING_UNITS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_SUB_ACCOUNTS.OFFENDER_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ROOT_OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID (+) = AT_ALL_LIVING_UNITS.LIVING_UNIT_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID = WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.CASELOAD_ID) AND (WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND ((AT_ALL_LIVING_UNITS.AGY_LOC_ID || '-' || AT_ALL_LIVING_UNITS.LEVEL_1_CODE IN ('All') OR 'All' IN ('All')) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_OFFENDER_SUB_ACCOUNTS.CASELOAD_ID = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) AND AT_OFFENDER_SUB_ACCOUNTS.TRUST_ACCOUNT_CODE IN (2101, 2102, 2103)) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, 1, 1) || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME, 1, 1) || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2 IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2, 1, 1) END END, TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'dd/mm/yyyy'), SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID) + 2, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION))) _query1 ON _query0.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = _query1.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY), dataset_ AS (SELECT NOMS_NO_ FROM dataset_base_)
